lender.name: Ricardo Cesar
lender.loan_because: I loan because I wash to influence the would for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work at a coffee shop as the front end waiter at a South Tampa Dinner.

lender.name: ratesh
lender.loan_because: Microcredit lending has proved to be very successful and I value knowing who the recipients of my loans are.
lender.occupational_info: I work in project management deploying software solutions that facilitate energy trading.

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have,and its very important to me to share with my borthers and sisters who have less
lender.occupational_info: My work is one of listening and helping people who are depressed and anxious about lots of problems in their lives

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others. As the mother of 3, I feel it is my job to teach my children the ways in which we CAN change the world for the better.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: I am doing my thesis on Indigenous entrepreneurship, trying to help Aboriginal Australians to create their own successful businesses.

lender.name: Dana Shields
lender.loan_because: It allows me to connect solidly with others during a time in which the world seems to have slipped into disconnection, alienation, and lack of coherent community. It helps me affirm that I'm a small part of what's vital between us. Kiva p2p lending has taught me that a little goes a long, long way.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a business analyst in the insurance & banking industry.
Microlending allows me the opportunity to give back and, in a very small gesture, enrich smart, innovative individuals in a way I never could before.
Helping to thread a brand new sort of global economic web is exciting.

lender.name: Dr. Debbie
lender.loan_because:
It's so incredible making a difference for others across the world.
I love Kiva and how they bring everyone together here. The impact is nothing short of miraculous!
lender.occupational_info:
Life Reset 123 is about 'resetting' the past so people/the world can live in the unlimited now.
Life Reset 123 is about erasing the past negative memories and experiences that get in the way of having an incredible life/world.
Life Reset 123 is about giving a brand new level of freedom with wellness, relationships, creativity, business and money.
Each person's life changes dramatically as a result of experiencing a Life Reset 123 phone session...each person will leave the session feeling happier, lighter and feeling revitalized.

lender.name: seza
lender.occupation: hairsylist and CFO of DLD Lumber, Inc.
lender.loan_because: I have a passion of giving back. I want to live in a world where paying it forward is a key to success.

lender.name: Cynthia & David
lender.loan_because: We have lived many years outside of the United States and have seen first hand the disparity of the haves and the have nots. This divide is not created by ability, but by access. Loaning helps close that divide.
lender.occupational_info: We work as administrators in public elementary schools in Washington State, in the US.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship and financial independence are necessary attributes of a healthy global economy. I believe entrepreneurs support of each other is critical to our collective success.
lender.occupational_info: start up and operate biotechnology and life science oriented companies

lender.name: John & Pam
lender.loan_because: I have a job and we want to help others with their jobs.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs used in a manufacturing facility.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It makes me a happier person to feel that I have the power to help someone else.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others with their businesses and their lives. I feel very happy to be able to help change lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health care field preparing patients samples to be tested for various illnesses.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of dreams, and I want to have a hand in their realization.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a pharmacy that specializes in HIV/AIDS care. I talk to people in my community about the pharmacy and about bringing our services to people living with HIV or AIDS.

lender.name: Antonia
lender.loan_because:
I believe helping others is not only ethical, but can foster goodwill and learning between people from different cultures and life experiences.
This picture is of me after celebrating the Indian spring festival Holi, Festival of Colors, with some university friends several years ago.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect in the first few years of my career. My firm typically designs large, commercial architecture projects for clients in Healthcare and Science & Technology.

lender.name: LaNelle Gambrell
lender.loan_because: People willing to help themselves deserve a chance

lender.name: CAROLYN
lender.loan_because: This type forum allows me to give to those that may need a small jester to give themselves pride and stability and I am so happy to do this.

lender.name: Rudy Castro
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world
lender.occupational_info: I work with people in need.

lender.name: Tincar
lender.loan_because: I'm empathetic.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'll be starting graduate school in the fall of '09, working towards a Cultural Studies degree. Besides tutoring writing, I work with homeless teens, acting as a role model.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Joel & Danielle
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are students currently residing in San Diego.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English at the university-level for two years in China. Last year I taught 8th grade Language Arts, ESL and Reading at a public school in Utah and I am now heading to Seoul, South Korea to teach English at a Language Camp for the next year.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: seems much more useful than keeping money in the bank.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting companies to mine without damaging the environment, plants and animals any more than necessary.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I admire these people! They work very hard to make a better life for themselves and their families and communities. In their successes I find hope.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher in elementary school and worked with homeless youth and at-risk teens.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: my friend amanda recommended this site and the idea is fantastic. i can't afford much now as a single parent but next year, watch out!

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: Because it facilitates empowerment where charity doesn't. It's passing on some of the opportunity I have because of the part of the world I was born.

lender.name: City of Casey
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Local Government, located in Melbourne, Australia

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I have been near the bottom and I know what it is to struggle. Now that I can afford to help, I would like to do what I can.

lender.name: Harriet
lender.loan_because: ...it makes so much sense!
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations work more effectively. Most of the groups I work with are not-for-profit agencies involved in human services.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It is good to help someone. May their wishes come true.
lender.occupational_info: Retired young because of health not wealth.

lender.name: Matt Takahashi
lender.loan_because: Colleagues of Executive BioSearch support the entrepreneurial spirit in developing countries, where a loan to hard-working people can make the world a better place.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something. ~ Edward Everett Hale

lender.name: Sean
lender.occupation: Director of Strategy at Twist Image
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans as a powerful and effective means of bringing about real and sustainable change for other entrepreneurs. Not everyone has access to funds and this is an amazing way to assist people in creating a better world for their family and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand and use technology to assist their businesses.

lender.name: Nickolin
lender.loan_because: This was a Christmas present from the Faith Lutheran Youth Group

lender.name: Nima
lender.loan_because: I have seen the impact of microfinance and Kiva is an excellent means of developing a personal engagement to the challenges of our time.

lender.name: Shuichi
lender.loan_because: I'd like to join this significant and exciting activity.

lender.name: Frazer
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that the people are helping themselves to get ahead and not looking for a straight donation.

lender.name: Edwards family
lender.occupation: Mom is a nurse and the boys attend school
lender.loan_because: I want my sons to learn that we can make a real difference, one person at a time. This is one way of showing the Buddha's compassion.
lender.occupational_info: I visit the sick and elderly at home and teach them about their medicines and how to live in healthier ways. I also treat their illnesses and tend any wounds they might have. My sons attend school full-time.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Overcoming poverty is not a gesture of charity. It is an act of justice. It is the protection of a fundamental human right, the right to dignity and a decent life - Nelson Mandela.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do - I have so much. I want to help others who are not so fortunate be more independent and free.
lender.occupational_info: I helped people whose minds were not clear. I now paint, weave and make jewelry.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can directly assist small businesses while gaining a greater understanding of how others live in their communities around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Architect in a busy practice in Tasmania Australia.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My children donate in my name for my birthday.

lender.name: Akil
lender.loan_because: it allows me in making a difference to one's life and family

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I love to help other people when I can. I have been given so much and want to empower others with the heart to excel.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that I actually see who I'm lending money to and also that it's a loan that creates new entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Creative advertising and communication

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: Research project management

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have money to help others
lender.occupational_info: I help creative businesses become even more successful.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: people less fortunate than I am are actively working to better their lives, and that is beautiful!

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: Giving is in the heart of every soul. We are responsible for our neighbour,
lender.occupational_info: Missionary and Design oriented.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I love growing and eating my own organic food and sharing it with others.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need ... so why not share .... :o)

lender.name: Martin & Annie
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good to us, so we would like to share this with others

lender.name: JohanHedberg
lender.loan_because: If I in any way can help another human being to get a better life, it's my duty to do so.

lender.name: Human
lender.loan_because: We love helping other human businesses get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: We're a creative agency based in Sydney, Australia

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world. We are very fortunate in Australia & the least we can do is help others.
lender.occupational_info: Own four premium comfort shoe retail stores

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I've been so lucky in my life until today and I think it's my turn to share.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me. I like the idea of helping those who help themselves.

lender.name: Linda and me
lender.loan_because: giving is better than receiving :)

lender.name: Lachlan
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place for those less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I work on weekends at pubs and nightclubs, playing all kinds of music to make people dance and have fun!

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I think small endeavours to change the world will eventually trigger a positive chain reaction. My goal is to save monthly and reinvest the money paid back in the most efficient way so that as many people as possible can benefit from it... a petite endeavour to help people help themselves. Help me help the others. My best wishes to all of us
lender.occupational_info: I am striving to restore the confidence and the satisfaction of customers who bought mobile phones. I am also an artist who wants to show unexpected beauty...

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: you deserve it
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of psychology.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Social entrepreneurship is an exciting and sustainable way to make comprehensive economic change in small communities.
lender.occupational_info: I build small businesses that generate money and meaningful jobs for clients of our homeless shelters.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that eradicating poverty is possible, and doing so will make the world more peaceful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office. I have a lot of admiration for entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: we humans need to help each other, so the whole world can be a better place! Kiva is great to connect those who need help with those who can give it easily!
lender.occupational_info: I program computers: My work is to discover what users need from a computer and to make the computer do it.

lender.name: akp
lender.loan_because: I want to put some action behind my compassion. When all the media reports about the world seem to overwhelm, I don't want to say, "But what can I do?" I can do something.
lender.occupational_info: I write poetry and songs, and I teach Creative Writing classes -- helping other people put words to their thoughts and feelings. I also sometimes perform concerts of my songs. I think that beautiful words, music, paintings, and other art can help inspire the human heart towards healing, wholeness, compassion, and service of others.

lender.name: BrookHavenPeriod2
lender.occupational_info: We are 7th grade students in Ms. Covell's history class. We are learning about Africa. Wea re also learning about micro loans and how they help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Matt-Kathy-Krystal-Teri
lender.loan_because:
It is great to be at a point in our lives where we can appreciate what we have and offer some assistance to those who are on a journey to create a sustainable business.
"Define yourself, and the world defines your opportunities."

lender.name: BrookHavenPeriod3
lender.occupational_info: We are 7th grade students in Ms. Covell's history class. Currently, we are learning about Africa and how micro loans can help end poverty.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: We all deserve opportunity!

lender.name: BrookHavenPeriod4
lender.occupational_info: We are 7th grade students in Ms. Covell's history class. Our class is learning about Africa and how micro loans can benefit others.

lender.name: Caryn
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the day to day administrative functions of one of the biggest museums in the world.

lender.name: Peggi and Ken
lender.loan_because: This was a gift, chosen because i love sewing and collect sewing machines, so helping others get sewing machines was a good match!

lender.name: Roni
lender.loan_because: it is important to help others, it brings meaning to your life.
lender.occupational_info: A soldier in the israeli army.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: we are here to help each other

lender.name: Stef
lender.whereabouts: Port St. Mary Isle of Man

lender.name: Hannah
lender.occupational_info: I hire a staff of 230 people to work with children at a summer camp in the United States.

lender.name: We Do Windows!, Inc
lender.occupational_info: We do Residential Window Cleaning in the Grand Rapids, Michigan area.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School English Language Arts which includes the study of literature, grammar, writing skills, and critical thinking.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I plant trees.

lender.name: Birkel
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides a wonderful opportunity to help people realise their business ideas. This is ideal help for self-help. Good luck to all entrepreneuers!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: "if you want to give me something, put it in my hand" SriLankan woman in Naomi Kleins book shock doctrine
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to reduce pollution

lender.name: Belem
lender.loan_because: I believe in progress and small getures.
lender.occupational_info: loving what you do helps!

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, just as the bible says to do.
lender.occupational_info: I program computer and phone applications. I am also a student at a middle school, I am an 8th grader.

lender.name: Sherwin
lender.loan_because: I want to help those around the world engage in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. There was no logical reason why I should'nt donate after I viewed the website.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that produces plastic pellets for many different uses such as containers, toys, dvd cases etc. When I'm not doing that I'm playing music in a band called "Papa Grows Funk" I am the bass player.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is the right thing to do. I believe that if I want to receive, the best way is to give into someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a growing spiritual community in Fort Worth, Texas and as a retired librarian, I love books and love to connect people with books.

lender.name: Clara & Francisco
lender.loan_because: we want to help people arround the world and Kiva is a very interesting project.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer applications in a company that sells children clothes

lender.name: Kerwin
lender.loan_because: I spent 2 years in Chad, Africa, and saw true poverty. I want to be part of someone's success by offering a helping hand.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help people. I think the repayment part is a great idea because I see so many people in America that expect something for nothing and I don't agree with that. This is nice because you can see what your donation'loan is a part of!
lender.occupational_info: I own apartments that I rent out to people.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to empower people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Investment Advisor to Institutional Pension accounts/

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I believe micro lending can make a difference...

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard work to earn a living. Lending through Kiva is a great way to enable others to help themselves AND a great way to stretch my donation dollars further.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help women and children in less forutnate areas of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Management of government funds and records.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's the smartest and easiest way to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language to 1st year university students in the UAE.

lender.name: Mart
lender.loan_because: The world is a small place.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I think it comes down to the butterfly effect and enlightened self-interest -- the better any one of us is doing on this planet, the better we're all doing. It ripples out. I like being able to be a part of the positive ripples...

lender.name: Jyl
lender.loan_because: Its a small way that I can make a difference. Its fun to see what people are doing - and to think that I am a small part of making it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math!

lender.name: The Chamberlain Group
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed and want to give back to those who need it. We are excited to team up with our clients to make this possible for so many others out there.
lender.occupational_info: We help others buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: We are called by a higher power to provide for others when we are provided for. Giving is wonderful, and the ability to grow the available leverage with time in a sustainable fashion is that much more powerful.
lender.occupational_info: I review and authorize water and wastewater construction projects in my state in the United States.

lender.name: sunil
lender.loan_because: I love to see responsible people who are determined to do something in their life and just need a little push to go along their way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a team that helps organizations build secure environments for their business to grow.

lender.name: Craig & Rachael
lender.loan_because: it's needed

lender.name: Laura and Sophia
lender.loan_because: it can help change a person's life. .
lender.occupational_info: I am a business education teacher. I hope to teach my daughter that we are all connected and that we need to help each other reach our dreams!

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe that building businesses will increase the standard of living throughout the world better than hand-outs.
lender.occupational_info: I trade stocks based on computer algorithms...

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My kids want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: My work is helping children learn compassion and responsibility for taking care of our world, however we can.

lender.name: G. David
lender.loan_because: I can share some of the benefits earned in Canada from good fortune and hard work with others less advantaged than I.
lender.occupational_info: I was involved in industrial manufacturing and steel construction. Today, I am an investor in oil, mine and fertilizer companies.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: the world is filled with people who deserve all the opportunities, luxuries and privileges that I enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a charity helping cancer patients.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I rent and sell space to people to run their businesses.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in raw truth; helping people transform limiting beliefs into results they desire and deserve.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to help enable people to reach their full potential... Everybody should have the opportunity to succeed if they dedicate themselves to a goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a global investment bank evaluating investment opportunities in the energy space.

lender.name: Jayne Patterson
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be prosperous in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lender.name: Mertyce and Timothy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people have better lives.

lender.name: Ragi Yaser
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Ingeniero de Computacin.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: Microlending is charitable, but in a way that doesn't encourage passive receipt of handouts. Plus, it works!

lender.name: Kristle
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I saw a video from Frontline PBS and I instantly knew that I could do something myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I will soon be going to graduate school in about a year.

lender.name: Jocabed Malachowski
lender.loan_because: I want to :) and it's a way of helping people less fortunate. Es una manera de ayudar a gente menos afortunada que uno.
